subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こし}}

# [[waist]], the (lower) back, the small of the back
# {{lb|ja|anatomy}} [[hip]]
# the [[skirting]] of a shoji
# the third line of a [[tanka]] poem

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|腰掛ける|こしかける}}: sit down
